import React from "../../../node_modules/react"; import "./LearnCard.css"; /* The Learn page will have LearnCards that will show a pop-up modal window when clicked. */ const LearnCard = (props) => { return (

{props.title}

{props.text}

{props.modalBody}

{props.modalTitle}
{props.modalBody}
) }; export default LearnCard;
